entry.title: AI_tools
entry.content:
AI模型概览及工具汇总

阅读完这篇文章后，你应该浏览一下指导，了解我们博客的主要方面。

AI天花板

  1. OpenAI ChatGPT https://chatgpt.com/
  2. Anthropic Claude https://claude.ai/
  3. Google Gemini https://gemini.google.com/app
  4. MetaAI llama https://www.meta.ai/
  5. Microsoft Copilot https://copilot.microsoft.com/
  6. xAI Grok https://x.ai/
  7. Mistral Le Chat https://chat.mistral.ai/chat
  8. ChatGLM（知谱清言） https://chatglm.cn/?lang=zh
  9. 讯飞星火 https://xinghuo.xfyun.cn/
  10. 天工AI https://www.tiangong.cn/
  11. 文心一言 https://yiyan.baidu.com/
  12. Deepseek https://www.deepseek.com/

AI集合工具

所有工具均免费开源，无需考虑安全问题

  1. ChatAll

    下载链接直达:

    1.1. Windows

    1.2. Mac

    1.3. Linux

ChatAll, Chatbox, lobechat, cherry studio功能一样，都是集成各个AI于一体的软件，ChatAll最有用的功能就是可以同时和多个模型一起对话，不需要
每个模型分别对话，一次提问多模型同时作答。还有一个优点就是国内模型只需要登录即可使用，国外模型需要API调用。注意软件都支持中文，如果不适应英语，安装
时请选择简体中文。

内置模型如下，根据需要选择自己需要的（不适应安装时请选择中文）

  1. Chatbox

    下载链接直达

    2.1. Windows

    2.2. Mac

    2.3. Linux

  2. lobechat（Docker部署）

  1. cherry studio

    下载链接直达

    4.1. Windows

    4.2. Mac

  2. LM studio

    下载链接直达

    5.1. Windows

    5.2. Mac

    5.3. Linux

LM studio, Ollama, AnythingLM, Chat with RTX均是下载开源模型，安装后，载入模型问答无需网络，全部在本地运行，所以对电脑性能有要求，其中
Ollama仅需CPU即可运行，Chat with RTX要求显存（GPU内存）≥8G才能使用。

  1. Ollama

    下载链接直达

    6.1. Windows

    6.2. Mac

    6.3. Linux:

Ollama安装后在终端运行，没有用户界面（GUI），因为其他软件均在软件本体下载模型，而Ollama需要在官网查看模型，
使用:

才能安装，例如安装llama3.3：

  1. AnythingLLM

    下载链接直达

    7.1. Windows

    7.2. Mac

    7.3. Linux

  2. NextChat
    下载链接直达

    Windows/Mac

  3. Chat with RTX（Nvidia英伟达显卡专属） 下载链接直达

entry.title: Guidance
entry.content:
AllLink-official

Hello everyone, welcome to our website!

We Focus on making everyone chat online without hindrance all over the world and study free. You can learn topics as following.

  1. Free VPN Software/Proxy Tools (mainly free software)
  2. Useful learning websites
  3. Study sources (PDF)
  4. AI/Machine Learning
  5. Computer Science (CS)
  6. Data Science (DS)
  7. Biology/Bioscience/Life Science/Medicine
  8. Chemistry
  9. Physics
  10. Mathematics

Note: allowed to be used for study; not allowed to be commercial

entry.title: proxy_tools
entry.content:
Proxy Tools

After reading this post, we strongly recommend you read Guidance to understand our purpose.

Due to the policies of some countries or regions, many people cannot search associated-content by Google/Youtube for studying, therefor we list mainly useful APP to achive it. We summarize the APP(Android, iOS/iPadOS/MacOS, Windows, Linux) and provide you links. Because of open sources, they’re very safe.

Android

  • V2RayNG https://github.com/2dust/v2rayNG/releases/latest
  • Clash for Android https://github.com/clashdownload/Clash_for_Android/releases/download/2.5.12/cfa-2.5.12-premium-universal-release.apk
  • Hiddify https://github.com/hiddify/hiddify-app/releases/latest
  • sing-box https://github.com/SagerNet/sing-box/releases/latest
  • Nekobox https://github.com/MatsuriDayo/NekoBoxForAndroid/releases/latest
  • ClashMeta for Android https://github.com/MetaCubeX/ClashMetaForAndroid/releases/latest
  • FlClash https://github.com/chen08209/FlClash/releases/latest
  • Surfboard https://github.com/getsurfboard/surfboard/releases/latest
  • HiddifyNG https://github.com/hiddify/HiddifyNG/releases/latest
  • Karing https://github.com/KaringX/karing/releases/latest
  • Shadowsocks-android https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-android/releases/latest
  • Trojan https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.crosserr.trojan&pcampaignid=web_share
  • XX-Net https://github.com/XX-net/XX-Net/releases/latest/latest
  • clash-rev https://github.com/MerlinKodo/clash-rev/releases/latest
  • mihomo https://github.com/MetaCubeX/mihomo/releases/latest
  • V2ray-core https://github.com/v2fly/v2ray-core/releases/latest
  • Xray-core https://github.com/XTLS/Xray-core/releases/latest
  • shadowsocksr-v2ray-trojan-android https://github.com/xxf098/shadowsocksr-v2ray-trojan-android/releases/latest
  • ShadowShare https://github.com/Pawdroid/ShadowShare/releases/latest
  • Shadowrocketx- https://github.com/crosserR/Shadowrocketx-/releases/latest

  • Clash for Windows https://www.clashforwindows.net/clash-for-windows-download/
  • karing (App Store)
  • sing-box https://github.com/SagerNet/sing-box/releases/latest
  • Hiddify (App Store)
  • Quantumult-X (App Store)
  • Surge (App Store)
  • Loon (App Store)
  • Shadowrocket (App Store)
  • Clash Verge Rev https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/releases/latest
  • FlClash https://github.com/chen08209/FlClash/releases/latest
  • Clash Nyanpasu https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/releases/latest
  • Hiddify https://github.com/hiddify/hiddify-app/releases/latest
  • Clash Verge https://github.com/zzzgydi/clash-verge/releases/latest
  • XX-Net https://github.com/XX-net/XX-Net/releases/latest
  • V2ray-core https://github.com/v2fly/v2ray-core/releases/latest
  • Xray-core https://github.com/XTLS/Xray-core/releases/latest
  • V2RayU https://github.com/yanue/V2rayU/releases/latest
  • Qv2ray https://github.com/Qv2ray/Qv2ray/releases/latest
  • ShadowsocksX-NG https://github.com/shadowsocks/ShadowsocksX-NG/releases/latest

  • Clash Meta for Windows Mini https://github.com/kogekiplay/ClashMetaForWindows_Mini//latest
  • Clashr-Auto Desktop https://github.com/ClashrAuto/Clashr-Auto-Desktop/releases/latest

  • Karing https://github.com/KaringX/karing/releases/latest
  • Clash Nyanpasu https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/releases/latest
  • V2RayA https://github.com/v2rayA/v2rayA/releases/latest

  • Xray-core https://github.com/XTLS/Xray-core/releases/latest

Linux

  • V2RayN https://github.com/2dust/v2rayN/releases/latest
  • Clash for windows https://www.clashforwindows.net/clash-for-windows-download/
  • sing-box https://github.com/SagerNet/sing-box/releases/latest
  • Clash Verge Rev https://github.com/clash-verge-rev/clash-verge-rev/releases/latest
  • FlClash https://github.com/chen08209/FlClash/releases/latest
  • Clashr-Auto Desktop https://github.com/ClashrAuto/Clashr-Auto-Desktop/releases/latest
  • Clash Nyanpasu https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/releases/latest
  • Hiddify https://github.com/hiddify/hiddify-app/releases/latest
  • Clash Verge https://github.com/zzzgydi/clash-verge/releases//latest
  • V2RayA https://github.com/v2rayA/v2rayA/releases/latest
  • XX-Net https://github.com/XX-net/XX-Net/releases/latest
  • ProxySU https://github.com/proxysu/ProxySU/releases/latest
  • clash-rev https://github.com/MerlinKodo/clash-rev/releases/latest
  • mihomo https://github.com/MetaCubeX/mihomo/releases/latest
  • V2ray-core https://github.com/v2fly/v2ray-core/releases/latest
  • Xray-core https://github.com/XTLS/Xray-core/releases/latest
  • v2ray https://github.com/233boy/v2ray/releases/latest
  • Qv2ray https://github.com/Qv2ray/Qv2ray/releases/latest
  • xray https://github.com/chaitin/xray/releases/latest
  • v2rayL https://github.com/jiangxufeng/v2rayL/releases/latest
  • Trojan https://github.com/trojan-gfw/trojan/releases/latest
  • Trojan-new https://github.com/Jrohy/trojan/releases/latest
  • trojan-go https://github.com/p4gefau1t/trojan-go/releases/latest
  • x-ui https://github.com/MHSanaei/3x-ui/releases/latest
  • Mihomo-party https://github.com/mihomo-party-org/mihomo-party/releases/latest

Soft Router/软路由

The soft router refers to a software-based router that uses regular computer hardware and software to perform routing tasks, as opposed to hardware-based routers which are dedicated devices designed specifically for network routing.

Serials

  1. OpenWrt https://github.com/openwrt/openwrt/releases/latest
  2. iStoreOS https://github.com/istoreos/istoreos/releases/latest
  3. iKuai https://www.ikuai8.com/component/download

proxy plugins

  • openClash https://github.com/vernesong/OpenClash/releases/latest
  • passwall https://github.com/xiaorouji/openwrt-passwall/releases/latest

browser extensions

  • Jego/无忧行

    是一款 Edge 和 Chrome 的插件，安装此插件允许免费用户访问谷歌服务、微软Copilot和ChatGPT等服务。请注意仅有谷歌搜索和谷歌学习，例如Youtube等娱乐工具是无法访问的，官网也说了免费用户提供学术服务，付费用户可以解锁Youtube等娱乐网站，满足了很大一批用户的需求，对于国内的ip封锁，严重影响了科研人员检索文献的需求，因此，这款免费的插件真的十分良心，有喜欢的赶紧去体验一下吧。其插件需要注册才能使用，但是不要害怕，因为不需要邮箱📧验证，因此随便编一个邮箱即可，付费用户除外。

Docker

Clash serials

v2ray serials

sing-box

Hiddify

Apple ID/美区

非常简单，首先注册你所在国家或地区的 Apple 账号，然后在账号信息中修改成美国地址即可，可以用美国地址生成器完成。

Google ID/谷歌账户

使用纯净一点的节点即可无法手机验证码即可注册成功。

AOSP-based ROM/类原生

对于使用 Android 手机的用户，国产 OS 内置大量广告以及反诈骗 APP，十分影响体验，因此可以刷入基于 AOSP 制作的类原生 OS，没有广告且不臃肿，比较有名的有:

  • Pixel Experience https://get.pixelexperience.org/
  • Lineage OS https://lineageos.org/
  • Ares OS https://chriscatto.gitlab.io/AresOS/
  • CrDroid https://crdroid.net/

等等。鉴于国家政策，多数厂商关闭了 BL 解锁通道，目前仅有 OnePlus 用户可以轻松解锁 BootLoader 进行刷机操作，其他品牌均有各种问题，需要说明的是三星解锁 Bl 很简单，但是不能 root，有熔断机制。因此如果你有搞机需求，国产手机仅有 oneplus 还可以，国外品牌就很轻松了，Google Pixel，Samsung，Sony 均没有限制，其中 Google Pixel 的 ROM 最多。

Google Play

Google Play APK

最新的国产Android系统内置Google服务，请注意，华为安卓鸿蒙系统(version ≤ HarmonyOS4.2)没有，但是可以使用其他开源项目来调用GMS，稍后会讲。在设置中有Google开关选项，唯有Google Play Store需要手动安装，安装包可以通过以下链接下载（无需魔法访问）：

  • TechSpot https://www.techspot.com/downloads/6105-google-play-store.html
  • APKSHKI https://apkshki.cn.com/app/google-play-store
  • FilePlanet https://google-play.fileplanet.com/apk
  • Softpedia https://mobile.softpedia.com/apk/google-play-store/

Other APP Store

当然，除了下载Play Store安装App，也有一些不依赖Google服务的应用商店，可以无需Google账号即可下载App，这些平台**「非」**华为Harmony Next系统手机也可安装使用：

  • Aurora Store https://f-droid.org/en/packages/com.aurora.store/
  • uptodown https://uptodown-android.cn.uptodown.com/android
  • Amazon App Store https://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/get/amazonapp

除此之外，还有一些网站（需要魔法）也可以之间下载apk文件（安卓APP安装包）：

  • APKmirror https://www.apkmirror.com/
  • APKCombo https://apkcombo.com/
  • Uptodown https://google-play.en.uptodown.com/

MicroG

华为安卓鸿蒙系统(version ≤ HarmonyOS4.2)可以安装MicroG来替代GMS，不过华为手机无法安装Play Store或者说有办法安装，但是不能更新系统，一更新就不能用了，就得重新安装，并且安装非常麻烦，所以推荐大家使用MicroG+第三方App Store。MicroG作为开源程序，安全性可以得到保障，据说华为欧洲也在积极适配。

MicroG所需要的安装包项目主页均已提供，另外华为应用市场非国区也可下载：华为应用商店→我的→设置→国家/地区→选择的其他国家→输入账号密码验证→下载MicroG Companion和MicroG Server→打开手机设置-应用和服务-应用管理→打开MicroG服务APP详情页面→点击右上角齿轮→点击自我检查→添加Google账号，完成后即可使用。

VPN Provider/机场

机场众多，勿买廉价节点

可选择的机场很多，但也不乏有几元/月的节点，这些机场存在安全风险，请慎重考虑。价格高的机场拥有更好的速度与服务，如果不愿意在此方面花销太多，可以选择免费的节点，它们多源于博主的分享，在此不予分享，请自行检索。接下来为大家推荐几个经典老牌机场，他们经营多年，跑路风险相对较低。

收费机场推荐

  1. 桔子云
  2. NiceCloud
  3. 跨境Cloud
  4. 极客云
  5. DuangCloud
  6. Gatern

再次提醒，机场用于学习用途最佳，娱乐要求不高的没必要付费，保持高度理智，不要被某些言论误导，要有自己的意志。爱国，爱家人，爱自己。
